name: Etesia III
description:
a guardian made a wish,of love and family.a soul is born by the hand of the gods,it take shape of Miyorha who obtain a body.her goal is now to meet the guardian,thanks to him she live on the Ethesyan country.

it's a colored and fresh story.

this project has been abandoned because it need money to do more of content,we want to give more content,it will be the case if some people can donate ,even 1$

it's free to upload and play,and you are free to donate (before or after have played this game) it's our first project with english project
